subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Ted Lilly’s no-hit bid ended in the ninth when pinch-hitter Juan Pierre led off with a single, but the Cubs held on to beat the White Sox, who took a no-hit bid into the seventh.
snippet: Ted Lilly’s no-hit bid ended in the ninth when pinch-hitter Juan Pierre led off with a single, but the Cubs held on to beat the White Sox, who took a no-hit bid into the seventh.
